review_data.title: Margarita
review_data.content: Had two margarita pizza takeaways. The pizza's were ok and not that great. The location is good and not much hassle to find it.

review_data.title: Sehr gutes Restaurant mit freundlicher Bedienung
review_data.content: Das Essen hat ausgezeichnet geschmeckt und preislich völlig OK. Der Service war sehr speditiv und freundlich.

review_data.title: Good pizza, family friendly, fairly priced Italian restaurant
review_data.content: it's a great place to go with your family and kids, also large groups, they are very welcome and patient Food is authentic Italian Quality is OK and it is easy to reach with public transport (walking from Oerlikon train station also possible)
